newsitem.title: USA: U.S. cotton weekly export sales highlights - USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. cotton weekly export sales highlights - USDA.

text.p: USDA cotton export sales highlights in latest reporting week:

Net Upland sales of 214,600 running bales (RB) were 10 percent below the previous week, but exceeded the 4-week average by 72 percent. The major increases were for China (68,900 RB), Mexico (32,000 RB), Indonesia (27,600 RB), and Hong Kong (27,500 RB).

Exports of 172,500 RB were off 8 percent from the previous week's marketing-year high, but were 15 percent above the 4-week average. Asian destinations accounted for 83 percent of the week's shipments; Western Hemisphere, 12 percent; and West European, 5 percent
